alert.note: Alert for Western Greenbrier (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 4:30AM EST until December 11 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Western Greenbrier County. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures drop below freezing shortly after sunset. Be prepared for wet roads to become slick this evening. Wind chills be Monday morning will be in the single digits and teens.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
